projects.title: Gmail Password Validation Automation with Python
projects.description: This project offers a Python solution that automates password checking in Gmail, greatly enhancing your email marketing efficiency. With Playwright or Selenium, you are able to save a whopping 50% of time that you would normally spend typing multiple Gmail accounts manually.

projects.title: NuComply-Generic-Parser
projects.description: Created and developed an automatic web content parsing program to retrieve and process data from several sources, such as PDFs, HTML, and hybrid formats. The tool incorporates a configurable configuration management system for scheduling, retry intervals, and URL-specific parsing flags. By substituting laborious manual content handling procedures, this system computerizes tasks for sub-URL processing and document tracking, with minimal human intervention and errors. The application also leverages the latest technologies such as OpenAI's dynamic XPath generation API, which further automates data extraction workflows.

projects.title: Park Access Control System
projects.description: Created an affordable web application for park access control. This web application adopts a combination of QR code, IP, and location for safe login/logout without the need for expensive facial recognition or fingerprint reader. This is an innovative solution that offers a secure and affordable alternative compared to traditional access controls.

projects.title: London Borough Real Estate Platform (LBREP) - Backend
projects.description: A Django-based real estate listing platform with geographic information system (GIS) capabilities, allowing users to browse properties in London with spatial data and points of interest. The platform features comprehensive property listings, user management, and spatial query functionality.

projects.title: London Borough Real Estate Platform - Frontend
projects.description: A modern React-based frontend application for the London Borough Real Estate Platform (LBREP) that seamlessly connects to a Django REST API backend with advanced GIS functionality for property browsing and management.
